lines.speaker: HOST
lines.text: Good evening, sports fans! We're coming to you live from the arena where last night's big {!sport_name} game went down. The place was electric as two of the top teams in the league went head to head for the ultimate prize. And boy, did they deliver!

lines.speaker: COHOST
lines.text: That's right, {@host}. It was a nail-biter all the way through, with both teams giving it their all. But in the end, there could only be one winner. {@sportsreporter}, can you take us through the final moments of the game?

lines.speaker: SPORTSREPORTER
lines.text:
Absolutely, {@cohost}. It was neck and neck right up until the very end. But with just seconds left on the clock, {!sports_winning_play}.
 And with that the {!winning_team} had won, {!winning_team_score} - {!losing_team_score}.

lines.speaker: COHOST
lines.text: It was definitely an exciting game, {@sportsreporter}. Who do you think was the standout player of the game?

lines.speaker: SPORTSREPORTER
lines.text: Well, {@cohost}, there were a lot of great performances out there last night. But I have to give it to {!standout_player} for {!standout_player_action}. *Insert joke or pun here about standout player's performance, {@host}!*

lines.speaker: HOST
lines.text: Very funny, {@sportsreporter}! Thanks for joining us, and thanks to all of you at home for tuning in. We'll see you next time for more sports news and analysis!
